metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8398 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: dwarf.c in GNU Binutils 2.28 is vulnerable to an invalid read of size 1 during dumping of debug information from a corrupt binary. This vulnerability causes programs that conduct an analysis of binary programs, such as objdump and readelf, to crash.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Manh-Dung Nguyen, Marcel BÃ¶hme, and Van-Thuan Pham

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
